title: Print, "Citibank memo design", ca. 1975
description: Pink Citibank note pad with 4 registers. First register: line at top under which is written in top left corner: To, and in top left: Location. Second register: 6 lines for remarks: inscribed Remarks under a thick dark line. Third register: 3 lines of various statements to check off . First two lines have 3 options: See/Phone Me, For Your Comments, Please Approve/ For Your Info./File, Return with Reply, Please Handle/ Note and Send To, ____. Fourth Register, Line with: From (Name and Location) written under it. Under this, line that spans right half of the page with Phone No. and Date written under. Bottom left inscribed: 151308 (SF1041 Rev. 5-76), Bottom right: Citibank logo with no text, circle filled in black and + left as negative space.
